title: [Extension Proposal] Quarkus Kiota extension

labels.name: area/quarkiverse
labels.description: This issue/PR is part of the Quarkiverse organization

body:
### Description

Currently, the code is in this repository: https://github.com/kiota-community/kiota-java-extra under the `quarkus` folder.

Interested in this extension, please +1 via the emoji/reaction feature of GitHub (top right).

### Repository name

quarkus-kiota

### Short description

A Quarkus extension to generate client code/SDKs for OpenAPI specifications leveraging [Kiota](https://github.com/microsoft/kiota).

### Repository Homepage URL

https://github.com/kiota-community/kiota-java-extra/blob/main/docs/modules/ROOT/pages/index.adoc

### Repository Topics

- quarkus-extension
- 
...


### Team Members

- @andreaTP


### Additional context

I would prefer to keep the repository under its current organization, if possible.
